title.rendered: Classic sausage, white bean and vine tomato shepherd’s pie

content.rendered:
Classic sausage, white bean and vine tomato shepherd’s pie

Ingredients

Ingredients
1 Pkt Fry’s Artisan Mediterranean Sausages
(6 x 50g), each cut into slices
15ml (1 TBSP) oil
1 onion, finely chopped
5ml (1 tsp) crushed garlic
1 tin white beans, drained
1 tin cherry tomatoes
2,5ml (½ tsp) mixed herbs
Salt and pepper to taste
3 cups mashed potato with chives mixed in (boil potatoes and mash with vegan mayonnaise), mashed with 75ml (5 TBSP) vegan mayonnaise

Directions

Heat the oil in a pan and fry the onion and garlic until soft.

Add the sausages and fry until lightly browned.

Add the drained beans, cherry tomatoes and mixed herbs and simmer for 3 minutes.

Season to taste.

Pour the mixture into an oven proof dish and top with the mash, spread or piped over.

Bake at 180C until the mash is light golden.
